name: Vampire Horde Demo
description:
Fight against endless waves of guards using weapons and magic. Every kill rewards points, use points to purchase weapons and upgrades. There is around three or four secret items that you can find by doing certain tasks that give powerful weapons and boosts.

This demo is designed for controlers, however keyboard and mouse still works.

This game was done in about 11 weeks, all assets used were not created by me.

Scenery is the Advanced Village Pack on the Unreal Marketplace.

Weapons and effects are from Infinity Blade.
